name: Blue Ocean Robotics Norway
goal: To develop robotic solutions in collaboration with our partners. In the Digital Therapeutics Partnership our focus relates to solutions which enable the acquisition and use of continuous medical diagnostic information via robotic/smart devices, so that care and treatment becomes more preventive (early detection of disease), predictive (better risk stratification), and personalized (ability to optimize treatment to the individual).
interests: Development, Education, Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: European Digital Therapeutics Partnership (DTP); Intend to participate in the European Commission's High-Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence
